name: Digging for Water
description: Dig deeper as you can to find the precious water source and grow a unique fruit tree! Play with friends via Local-multiplayer up to 3 players (1 keyboard and 2 gamepads) To join the game use: Enter - keyboard players A (or X) - gamepad players Once all players joined the game starts. Move your root! Get as many fruits as possibile and avoid obstacles! If you stay behind or get trapped by thorns, you'll respawn close to your friends. Bindings: A-D / Arrow keys - keyboard player Left Analog Stick - gamepad player END GAME Each game will grow a unique fruit tree: deep level and fruits collected will shape your tree and make it bigger and fruity.
